corrected: Amhākaṁ bhante sake ācariyake evaṁ hoti

original: ‘ambho purisa, yaṁ tvaṁ janapadakalyāṇiṁ icchasi kāmesi, jānāsi taṁ janapadakalyāṇiṁ—evaṁnāmā
analyzed: ambho purisa yam tvam janapadakalyāṇim icchasi kāmesi jānāsi tam
corrected: ambho purisa yam tvam janapadakalyāṇim icchasi kāmesi jānāsi tam janapadakalyāṇim evamnāmā

original: bhāsate ca tapate ca virocati ca, yo vā rattandhakāratimisāya kimi khajjopanako—imesaṁ
analyzed: bhāsate ca tapate ca virocati ca yaḥ vā
corrected: bhāsate ca tapate ca virocati ca yo vā rattandhakāratimisāya kimi khajjopanako imesaṁ

original: “Yvāyaṁ, bhante, rattandhakāratimisāya kimi khajjopanako—ayaṁ imesaṁ ubhinnaṁ vaṇṇānaṁ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti.
analyzed: bhante rattandhakāratimisāya imesam ubhinnam vaṇṇānam abhikkantataraḥ ca paṇītataraḥ ca ati
corrected: Yvāyaṁ bhante rattandhakāratimisāya kimi khajjopanako ayaṁ imesaṁ ubhinnaṁ vaṇṇānaṁ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca ti

original: “Yvāyaṁ, bhante, rattandhakāratimisāya telappadīpo—ayaṁ imesaṁ ubhinnaṁ vaṇṇānaṁ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti.
analyzed: bhante ratta ndhakāra timisāya imesam ubhinnam vaṇṇānam abhikkantataraḥ ca paṇītataraḥ ca ati
corrected: Yvāyam bhante ratta ndhakāra timisāya telappadīpo ayam imesam ubhinnam vaṇṇānam abhikkantataraḥ ca paṇītataraḥ ca ti

original: vigatavalāhake deve osadhitārakā—imesaṁ ubhinnaṁ vaṇṇānaṁ katamo vaṇṇo abhikkantataro
analyzed: vigata valāhake deve ubhinnam vaṇṇānam katamaḥ vaṇṇaḥ abhikkantataraḥ
corrected: vigata valāhake deve osadhitārakā imesaṁ ubhinnam vaṇṇānam katamaḥ vaṇṇaḥ abhikkantataraḥ

original: pannarase viddhe vigatavalāhake deve abhido aḍḍharattasamayaṁ cando—imesaṁ ubhinnaṁ
analyzed: pannarase viddhe vigata valāhake deve abhidaḥ aḍḍha ratta samayam
corrected: pannarase viddhe vigata valāhake deve abhidaḥ aḍḍha ratta samayam cando imesam ubhinnam

original: “Ato kho te, udāyi, bahū hi bahutarā devā ye imesaṁ candimasūriyānaṁ ābhā nānubhonti, tyāhaṁ pajānāmi.
analyzed: atas khalu te udāyi bahū hi bahutarāḥ devāḥ ye ābhā na anubhonti tyā aham pajānāmi
corrected: atas khalu te udāyi bahū hi bahutarāḥ devāḥ ye imesaṁ candimasūriyānaṁ ābhā na anubhonti tyā aham pajānāmi

original: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānāti.

corrected: Khīṇā jāti vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ na aparaṁ itthattāya iti pajānāti

corrected: mā bhavaṁ udāyi ācariyo hutvā antevāsī vāsaṁ vasi iti
